pullRequest.title: Add auto_configure privilege
pullRequest.bodyText:
Adds a new index privilege named auto_configure that includes the auto_create and mapping/auto_put actions.
Depends on #58784 (some tests will fail until it is merged)
Relates to #53100

commit.message: fix some existing tests and add some new ones

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -228,6 +228,16 @@ All actions that are required to manage the lifecycle of a leader index, which
 includes <<ccr-post-forget-follower,forgetting a follower>>. This
 privilege is necessary only on clusters that contain leader indices.
 
+`managed_admin_ops`::
+Permits auto-creation of indices and data streams only if a template covering
+the requested name exists. An auto-create action is the result of an index or
+bulk request on a non-existent index or data stream rather than an explicit
+create index or create data stream request. Also permits auto-update of
+mappings on indices and data streams if they do not contradict any existing
+mappings on the index or data stream. An auto-update mapping action is the
+result of an index or bulk request on an index or data stream that contains
+new fields that may be mapped rather than an explicit put mapping request.
